mods.identifier: Helon Daniel Miller Collection JG Freyburger

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A cabinet card portrait of J.G. Freyberger, made at the Herstein Studio in Nashville, Tennessee. The notation on the verso reads: “Mr. J.G. Freyberger, 324 Main S., Nash. Tenn.” The 1892 Nashville City Directory cites three Freyberger family names: 1) George Freyberger, foreman E & N Mfg Co., bds 400 Woodland; 2) Michael Freyberger, wks E & N Mfg Co, bds 324 Main; and 3) M. Freyberger, wks E & N Mfg Co.” This photograph is possibly of J. George Freyberger, originally from Indiana, who lived in Nashville for about 10 years, where he was foreman of the East Nashville furniture Company. Forms part of the Helon Daniel Miller Collection. 1 cabinet card.
